person.persName: Lewis E. Krutz (Kentucky saw mill operator and tavern keeper)

body.p: Kentucky saw mill operator and tavern keeper. Indiana native. Married to Mary E. Lee Krutz on March 26, 1849. Father of Thomas Krutz, Clara A. Krutz, Luella Krutz, Ludora Krutz, and Luda B. Krutz. Saw mill operator in Ghent in 1860. Tavern keeper in OwenCounty, Kentucky, in 1863.
